phrases: She is been gazing at them a lot lately,
but do you think she might want to go?
Every dragon's had those thoughts at some point.
A journey to eliminate humanity, right?
No, I am talking about school.
I see that come up on the Internet often.
You have gotten used to it, huh.
Hey, Kanna, do not make trouble for Miss Kobayashi!
You need all this just to go to school?
Textbooks and storage boxes will be provided on the first day.

Pencil case Pencils Erasers Crayons (16 colors) Colored pencils (12 colors) Scissors Glue Pencil board Ruler Unruled notebooks Indoor slippers Slipper case Gym clothes Gym cap Gym clothes case Handkerchief Safety buzzer
I sense some collusion between schools and the manufacturers.
I do not think that is true.
It is a bad influence on dragons, too, huh...
Shop at your local shopping district!
Well, let us pick up all the stationery first.
I see stationery stores have not changed at all since long ago.
Jeez, you do not get it, Miss Kobayashi.
The feathers plucked from live birds around this season make good pens!
Seems like this is wrong, too.
When I was in the other world everyone used quill pens.
Oh, I heard a new store opened outside the shopping district recently.
You use this to write characters.
You will be using a pencil though, Kanna-chan.
I <3 Miss Kobayashi I <3 Miss Kobayashi I <3 Miss Kobayashi I <3 Miss Kobayashi
what is this thing that looks like a dragon's mouth?
How did you jump to that?
That is a tool for branding slaves.
You use it to mark your property.
I think that unicorn would be happy knowing this.
Part of me wants to ask, and part of me does not.
*Miss Kobayashi paid for it after this.
Now we have got most of it.
Then on to the next stop!
Does it really have to be this place?
This is the only place in the area that sells backpacks.
I understand that, but I still do not like it.
Kanna-chan, which one do you like?
She chose a surprisingly normal one.
I can see why you would choose a cursed item that is absorbed human blood.
I am sorry, I will be paying with card.
Ohyama Clothing Store Student Uniform Specialty Shop
Miss Kobayashi, Kanna's going to pout again if we go in another store like this.
This is the store designated by the school,
Are these the ones designated by the school?
Everyone should be wearing the same thing.
Men, women, Japanese, and foreigners are all the same.
What happens when you are different from everyone else?
It might not be like that for dragons,
but humans do not like things different from themselves.
Kanna-chan, are you looking forward to school?
Once we get home, we prepare for tomorrow!
Miss Kobayashi, that is not fair!
Too many different themes to tell.
In the end, she wore that backpack all day long.
She must really be looking forward to it.
Is it something to go that far over?
Even though she is a dragon, she is still a child.
Well, think you will remember them?
We will teach you how to earn money in your sleep!
Becoming a billionaire is not a dream!
Bring in business and good fortune!!
Increase your fortune just by learning these tips!
Guaranteed results or your money back!
Recommended for friends, family, and coworkers!
No co-signer needed Same-day financing Earn Fortune Money Boyfriend Cosigner Repay
Let us forget all this for now.
Give a bright smile every day
Today we have a new friend to introduce to everyone here.
It is a pleasure to meet you.
It looks like her introduction went well.
Leave it to me, Miss Kobayashi!
Kanna wanted to do things like that?
Such an inefficient way to learn.
Putting them in different classes based on their abilities would help them grow faster.
It seems to be some game of hitting each other with a ball.
A fitting game for barbaric humans.
You can do anything, cannot you?
Oh, can I call you that, too?
But they do take clear steps to ally themselves with the strong.
Even young, they are still human, huh?
Do not you think you have been standing out too much?
It is Saikawa, the one who acts like a queen!
You are so cute, it ticks me off and I want to hug you!
Wants to hug me, stood out, transfer student, cute and talented, too cute, eliminated
I will prove I am better than you!
and she is a hopeless person who will not admit defeat!
Now, care to try arm wrestling me?
Despite how I look, I have won at karate tournaments...
I would like to be friends.
I-I am sorry, I did not mean to!
I-I, um, I wanted to be friends with you, too!
Oh, shoot, what do I do?!
Here, I will give you some candy.
You cannot bring that to school.
What a roundabout way to settle things, Kanna.
I would have just blasted them away.
Why did you decide you wanted to go to school?
Because it was fun watching them.
I think there will be some aspects that are not fun, as well.
There is no real need for us to be the same as humans.
Living among them does not mean living with them.
But they are close by, and we share time together, so...
Maybe that is why I want to be with them.
I have seen plenty of my comrades
destroy themselves, unable to be satisfied with that.
For now, I will affirm that choice, too.
You can hang it on your backpack.
Hey, Miss Kobayashi, what about me?
They said to put them on my things.
The story starts one day ago.
Sorry I keep dropping by all the time.
You are checking up on Tohru, right?
I am bored with this already.
I am going to play some other game.
To be honest, you are here to check on Tohru, too, right?
I am going home with you today, so consider it an honor.
Today I will show you a good place to play!
Despite how big this place is, it is a hidden spot people rarely come to.
That is the thing you fly with!
W-Well, let us play on the seesaw together!
You are frightened by a ball coming your way?
L-Little children come here often, too, so you should stop that.
Whatever, we are taking over this place.
I told you to stop that.
I challenge you to dodgeball tomorrow!
If you lose, then give up on using this place!
S-She is going to play with us!
We do not have time to play with you.
Are you afraid I will discipline you all myself?
You are actually scared without your beloved mama around, are not you?
I thought you were not going to take a child seriously?
You better get ready to lose!
So you picked a fight and they bought it, huh?
So, did you gather enough people?
I think you can still negotiate with them.
No, I assure you, they should fight!
We cannot have them taking us noble, proud dragons lightly!
I have played a lot of Explosive Dodgeball.
This is not that kind of game.
All right, let us do this!
Do not worry, it will work out.
We will not go easy on you.
I could see how it would end when it started.
From the beginning their abilities... well, their species... were on different levels.
Yeah, they are the worst scum ever.
That phrasing may be accurate, but it is cruel.
I still have not had enough.
I have yet to win against you two, have not I?
Are you going to surpass us today?
Where did my peaceful, daily life run off to?
And that brings us to now.
Oh, I will restore the playground to normal.
I will tweak the memories of those who saw us, too.
You are useful to have around.
After that, they took to playing dodgeball regularly.
Pay more attention to your lower back!
More like you are an old lady about to be abandoned!
Hey, Kobayashi, this is super interesting.
Kanna-san, are not you glad we won the dodgeball game?
We nearly lost our ability to play at the playground.
I will be happy anywhere if I am with you, Saikawa.
